name: @gjsify/deno_std
description: Gjsify fork of Deno standard library to make use of the node compatibility layer

scripts.print:name: echo '@gjsify/deno_std'
scripts.build: yarn run build:gjsify && yarn run build:types
scripts.test: yarn run print:name && yarn run build && yarn run build:test && yarn run test:gjs
scripts.git:upstream:init: git remote add upstream https://github.com/denoland/deno_std.git || exit 0
scripts.git:upstream:merge: yarn git:upstream:init && git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
